thread.title: BRIEF-Flour Mills Of Nigeria Posts 9-Month Group Pre-Tax Profit 19.50 Bln Naira

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Flour Mills Of Nigeria Posts 9-Month Group Pre-Tax Profit 19.50 Bln Naira

organizations.name: brief-flour mills of nigeria posts 9-month group
reuters) - flour mills of nigeria plc

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Flour Mills Of Nigeria Plc:
* 9-MONTH GROUP PRE-TAX PROFIT 19.50 BILLION NAIRA VERSUS 10.29 BILLION NAIRA YEAR AGO‍​
* NINE MONTHS ENDED DEC 2017 GROUP REVENUE 427.50 BILLION NAIRA VERSUS 389.94 BILLION NAIRA YEAR AGO‍​ Source: bit.ly/2EnS6KL Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
